route.name: 新闻

parameters.category: 分类，见下表，默认为 CCF 新闻

route.description:
| CCF 新闻    | CCF 聚焦 | ACM 信息  |
| ----------- | -------- | --------- |
| Media_list | Focus    | ACM_News |

parameters.caty: 主分类，可在 URL 找到
parameters.id: 子分类，可在 URL 找到

provider_name: 中国研究生招生信息网

parameters.section: Section ID, can be found in the URL. For example, the Section ID of URL `http://iolaw.cssn.cn/zxzp/` is `zxzp`. The default value is `zxzp`

route.name: Job Openings
route.description: RSS feed for LMU academic staff job openings.

route.name: Public Maps

parameters.category: Categories, see the table below, `mind-map-examples` by default
parameters.language: Languages, see the table below, `en` by default

route.description:

| ------------- | ----------------- |
| Featured Map  | mind-map-examples |
| Business      | business          |
| Design        | design            |
| Education     | education         |
| Entertainment | entertainment     |
| Life          | life              |
| Marketing     | marketing         |
| Productivity  | productivity      |
| Summaries     | summaries         |
| Technology    | technology        |
| Other         | other             |

| ---------- | --------- |
| English    | en        |
| Deutsch    | de        |

| Español    | es        |
